articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Tideland Reclamation Site on Taegye Islet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Tideland Reclamation Site on Taegye Islet
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Tideland Reclamation Site on Taegye Islet in North Phyongan Province.
					 After being briefed on the reclamation before a huge map showing a panoramic view of the site, he went round for hours the huge breakwaters and reclamation site to acquaint himself in detail with the work done there.
					
					 He highly estimated the feats performed by the builders intensely loyal to the Party for having built one of the great structures to shine forever with the Songun era by courageously overcoming difficulties and ordeals and displaying popular heroism and unparalleled devotion.
					
					 The nature-remaking project as gigantic as the West Sea Barrage has been completed by the builders in the main, he noted, adding that this is a precious fruition of the persevering will of the Korean people to build a great prosperous powerful nation in this land with their own efforts and technology at any cost and a striking demonstration of the inexhaustible mental power of the heroic Korean people single-mindedly united around the party. 
					
					 Noting that the builders in the tideland reclamation site fully determined to successfully carry out the behests of President Kim Il Sung are the brave conquerors of sea and indomitable fighters expanding the land of the country braving rough waves, he praised them as creators of the feats to be always remembered by the country and its people. 
					
					 Then, he learned about the farming condition, while looking round paddy fields in the reclaimed tideland.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on a vast expanse of the fields which looks like a green carpet, he said that it was, indeed, spectacular scenery. And he expressed great satisfaction over the appearance of such huge socialist farm. 
					
					 He indicated ways of doing successful farming in the reclaimed tideland, greatly pleased to hear that the grain yield was on the increase every year. 
					
					 He put forward the tasks to be fulfilled to complete the reclamation project earlier than scheduled, saying that the reclamation of the tideland on Taegye Islet is one of the important undertakings for the development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 He underscored the need to take thorough-going measures for the supply of materials necessary for carrying out the project, noting that it is necessary to pay state attention to it as it is a difficult and vast one to harness nature. 
					
					 Enlarging the area of the land of the country, its eternal treasure, is an important work for the happiness of the generations to come and the prosperity of the country, he said, expressing great expectation and conviction that the above-said builders would demonstrate once again the revolutionary spirit of the heroic working class of the DPRK by successfully carrying out this honorable and noble mission and duty. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Phyong Hae, chief secretary of the  North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, Pak Nam Gi and Jang Song Thaek, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Greetings to Venezuelan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Venezuelan President
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Hugo Chavez Frias, President of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, on the occasion of its independence day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Venezuela would continue to grow strong, Kim in his message wished the president and people of Venezuela greater success in their work to defend the Bolivarian socialist revolution.

articles.title: Greetings to Malawian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Malawian President
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday sent a message of greetings to Bingu Wa Mutarika, President of Malawi, on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Malawi would grow strong in the mutual interests of the two peoples, Kim in his message wholeheartedly wished the president and people of Malawi greater success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Calls for New International Financial and Economic Order
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Calls for New International Financial and Economic Order
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government will positively join in the world efforts to establish a new international financial and economic order, in the future, too, declared a delegate of the DPRK addressing the UN meeting on the international financial and economic crisis and its impact on development held on June 29. 
					 Recalling that the worldwide financial and economic crisis that originated from the U.S. last year is adversely affecting political, economic, cultural and all other fields of many countries, he said, adding that this hardest hit developing countries and is throwing serious difficulties in the way of attaining the internationally agreed targets of development including the millennium goals for development. 
					
					 It is absolutely intolerable that the aftermath of the economic slowdown spawned by the burst of the bubble of the capitalist monetary market is more directly and seriously affecting the peoples of developing countries than those of the developed countries, he said. 
					
					 He expressed a positive view on the fact that the UN analyzed the worldwide financial and economic crisis and its cause and addressed in good time the important issues including the reform of the international financial system for the first time in its history.
					
					 He held that the only way of weathering the present worldwide financial and economic crisis is to do away with the outdated international economic order and establish a new international economic order whereby the sovereignty and interests of all countries are guaranteed on an equal basis.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Organizations Slammed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Progressive Organizations Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' intensified suppression of progressive organizations is a base and shameless repressive action as it is aimed at blindfolding the eyes of the south Korean people desirous of social independence and democratization and national reunification, stuffing their ears and gagging them and further strengthening the fascist dictatorship, says Minju Joson Sunday in a signed commentary.
					 Intolerable is the fascist crackdown on media persons of the MBC and teachers affiliated to the Teachers Union, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee group suppressed them, raising a hue and cry over "misinformation", "illegal action" and the like. This tells that the group of traitor's crackdown on the progressive organizations has reached an extreme pitch.
					
					 Its fascist suppression of the forces of the progressive movement is a revelation of its wild design to intensify its undemocratic and unpopular rule.
					
					 The Lee group is a bandit of traitors who unhesitatingly stoops to any infamy in order to gratify its political greed.
					
					 It is entirely just for the south Korean people to wage a more dynamic struggle against the "government", infuriated by the group's base and vicious suppression.
					
					 The Lee group's desperate moves to weaken and stamp out the progressive patriotic activities of the south Korean people would only precipitate its disgraceful ruin.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- It is thanks to the greatest Songun politics that the DPRK is advancing toward the high eminence of a thriving nation of Juche with full confidence, demonstrating the national power strong enough to crush any formidable enemy. 
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article dedicated to the anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Politics of Our Party Is an Effective Socialist Political Mode" on July 5, Juche 90 (2001).
					
					 The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea is a powerful weapon which provided the great Songun revolutionary unity centered on the headquarters of the revolution, an invincible treasured sword that helped the country demonstrate its dignity as a matchless power and serves as an engine which helped all the people give fullest play to their mental power and bring about a heyday of the country's prosperity, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The whole party and army and all the people are single-mindedly united around the headquarters of the revolution on the basis of the monolithic idea, faith, comradeship and the sense of obligation. This true picture of our society is the result of the great Songun politics. Thanks to the WPK's Songun politics the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have grown to be armed forces strong enough to mercilessly punish anyone provoking it and its national defence industry has a solid foundation capable of producing any military and technical means necessary for undertaking a modern warfare.   
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit advocated by the Songun politics of the WPK is the noble revolutionary spirit symbolizing and representing the great era of Songun. 
					
					 The Kanggye spirit which helped pave the way for building a land of bliss pulling through difficulties at the time of ordeal and the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude which helped bring about the present great revolutionary upswing are based on the revolutionary soldier spirit.  
					
					 Thanks to the great Songun politics the Korean revolution will always emerge victorious in the future, too, concludes the article.

articles.title: Campaign for Second Declaration on Situation Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Campaign for Second Declaration on Situation Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) released its second declaration on the situation on July 2, denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' unpopular policy and fascist suppression.
					 The declaration contended that the teachers should be guaranteed freedom of speech and expression as one of citizens.
					
					 Nevertheless, the authorities are imposing unreasonable punishment on the teachers involved in the campaign for announcing the declaration on the situation, the declaration said, branding it as an act of harassing the democratization of society.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop at once the crackdown on the teachers and enforce a correct educational policy.
					
					 The organization said that it would conduct a signature campaign for the movement for announcing the declaration on the situation among teachers across south Korea and open to the public the list of the participants through the organ of Jongyojo.

articles.title: Colorful Events Held Abroad
articles.content:
Colorful Events Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Lectures, round-table talks, briefings and film shows took place in Guinea, Nigeria, Uganda and Russia from June 13 to 29 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at the events were figures of the youth organization of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea, the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, the University of Abuja, the Group for the Study of Songun Politics of Kampala Coloro Higher Middle School of Uganda, the Russian Centre for the Information of International Science and Technology, a company and the Konvest Company in Russia and popular masses. 
					
					 At the events they praised Kim Jong Il for ushering in a new era of the Songun revolution and winning victory after victory by dint of ideology while guaranteeing the everlasting victory of the Korean revolution with the might of single-minded unity of the whole society. 
					
					They stressed that all changes made in the DPRK are attributable to the wise leadership of
						 Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued by Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued by Mexican Organization
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released a bulletin on the occasion of the 115th birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter. 
					 The bulletin in an article praised Kim Hyong Jik as an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea who devoted all his life to the struggle for the country's independence from the Japanese imperialists' military occupation.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik accomplished the historic cause of bringing about the dawn of modern Korea and provided an ideological and mental source of the Juche idea, the bulletin stressed.
					
					 The idea of "Jiwon" (aim high), regarded by Kim Hyong Jik as his motto, is the revolutionary view on life of enjoying true worth and happiness in the struggle for the country and the nation and the idea of national independence, the idea of continued revolution and the indomitable revolutionary spirit that Korea's independence should be achieved by the Korean people themselves and that the country's liberation should be achieved at any cost by fighting from generation to generation.
					
					 The bulletin said in detail that the Songun idea is based on the two pistols left by Kim Hyong Jik as heritage and comradeship, the basis of the single-minded unity of the DPRK, is unthinkable without his idea of making comrades.

articles.title: Stop to Hostile Policy toward DPRK Demanded
articles.content:
Stop to Hostile Policy toward DPRK Demanded
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on June 24 on the occasion of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people.
					 The statement said that 59 years have passed since the U.S. imperialists ignited a war of aggression on the young DPRK and about 56 years have passed since the Armistice Agreement was signed but peace and stability have not yet been ensured on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It stressed that the Korean people have waged a vigorous struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 But the movement for Korea's reunification is now facing a grave difficulty owing to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and the anti-DPRK moves of the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime of south Korea, the statement noted.
					
					 Bitterly denouncing the U.S. imperialists and their stooges for their war moves, the statement urged them to stop at once their hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 It expressed full support for the Korean people in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Solidarity with DPRK Expressed in Russia
articles.content:
Solidarity with DPRK Expressed in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting and a demonstration took place in Russia on June 25 to oppose the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK and support the Korean people's cause of justice.
					 Present at the meeting were personages and members of political parties of Russia, including the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks and the Communist Workers ' Party of Russia-Revolutionary Communist Party.
					
					 A statement was adopted at the meeting. It charged that the UNSC's "resolution" is a wanton violation of international law as it forces the DPRK to abandon its ideology and system, disarm itself and be shackled to outsiders economically.
					
					 This is a product of the undisguised strong-arm policy of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges seeking to break the will of the Korean people in the efforts to defend the national sovereignty and dignity and reunify the country at any cost, the statement pointed out.
					
					 It expressed support for the prudent and wise policy of the DPRK leadership which stands against the reckless moves of the imperialists bringing dark clouds of war to the Korean Peninsula with its measures to increase the self-defensive military capability and defend its sovereignty. 
					
					 Then the participants staged a demonstration.

articles.title: Remembrance Meeting Held by Koreans in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Remembrance Meeting Held by Koreans in Uzbekistan
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held a remembrance meeting on June 30 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there were Chairman Jo Yun Hae and other officials of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and compatriots.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said that the past 15 years are days when the Korean nation has deeply felt how a great man it had as its leader.
					
					 They praised the anti-Japanese armed struggle waged by the President as a sacred war for the freedom and independence of Korea.
					
					 Noting that the President provided a firm guarantee for the victory of revolution, foreseeing even the future of the Korean revolution with his far-sighted intelligence, they praised this as the undying feat which will shine long in the history of the country and the world politics.
					
					 They stressed that they could never forget the tireless efforts made by the President who devoted his all to the reunification of the country and the prosperity of the nation till the last moments of his great life, no matter how much water may flow under the bridge.
